field.name: NumLeds
field.description: The number of WS2811-style RGB LEDs onboard

field.name: AnnunciateRangeBegin
field.description: The first LED to use for annunciators/alarms. The LED's normal function is taken over when an alarm is present

field.name: AnnunciateRangeEnd
field.description: The last LED to use for annunciators/alarms. The LED's normal function is taken over when an alarm is present

field.name: RangeBegin
field.description: The beginning of the first range of controlled LEDs

field.name: RangeEnd
field.description: The end of the first range of controlled LEDs

field.name: RangeBaseColor
field.description: The color to drive the LEDs at baseline.

field.name: RangeEndColor
field.description: Another color to use as the end to a gradient sequence.

field.name: RangeColorBlendSource
field.description: What chooses the mix of basecolor and endcolor to use

field.name: RangeColorBlendType
field.description: How to combine the basecolor and endcolor

field.name: DefaultColor
field.description: The color to drive LEDs when they are not in a gradient range.
